title: Finding Gift in New Client
body: So I got a mystery gift and when I opened the new client all I got was a notification saying that I got a mystery gift but it wouldn't let me open it. I also can't find the mystery gift anywhere. Does anyone know where I am supposed to go to open it?

replies.body: ok so u can check it under client store, then go to account and then purchase history and then go to gifting history and you should find it there 100%{{item:3069}}

Yeah it's kind of dumb how hard it is to find it. Why can't they just add a slot somewhere on the home screen when you have a gift waiting to open? That way when you click on it, it can show you what you got and you don't have to go search forums just to find out what you got
You can check gifts you've received through the client store, under purchase history.  It looks like you received Freljord Rammus.  Very cool!  :D
Hey my friend just got theirs but there was no surprise dramatic animation like before why? i don`t feel its worth it where really bothered by this will that be changed? that was really disappointing
i got 2 gifts but i dont know what they are. Can you tell me please what is it? i already checked the purchase store but i didnt find anything. can you help me plase?
Go to the notifications tab to find it. It is the little bell by your summoner icon.
